definitions.definition: Of, or relating to invention ; pertaining to the act of devising new mechanisms or processes .
Possessed of a particular capacity for the design of new mechanisms or processes, creative or skilful at inventing .

main_definition: Of, or relating to invention ; pertaining to the act of devising new mechanisms or processes .
secondary_definitions: Possessed of a particular capacity for the design of new mechanisms or processes, creative or skilful at inventing .
